Barcelona

Legend has it that Barcelona was founded
by Hercules himself


Here is the list of interesting facts about Barcelona:

  • Barcelona is the only city in the world awarded a Royal Gold Medal for architecture by Royal Institute of British Architects
  • Barcelona had no beaches until the 1992 Olympics
  • Barcelona is one of the worldâ€™s major cities where smoking cannabis is legal
  • The Camp Nou is the largest stadium in Europe
  • The Sagrada Familia took longer to complete than the Egyptian Pyramids
  • Barcelona could have been home to the Eiffel Tower

"And Barcelona. You should see Barcelona. It is all still comic opera. First, it was the paradise of the crackpots and the romantic revolutionists. Now it is the paradise of the fake soldier. The soldiers who like to wear uniforms, who like to strut and swagger and wear red-and-black scarves. Who like everything about war except to fight. Valencia makes you sick and Barcelona makes you laugh."

Ernest Hemingway

If you have time, you should read more about this incredible city on its Wikipedia entry.
